mapper.select: SELECT seq, banner_title, banner_img, banner_link, banner_ord, chk_at, del_at, ins_dttm, upt_dttm, ins_user, upt_user FROM t_banner WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_banner (banner_title, banner_img, banner_link, banner_ord, chk_at, del_at, ins_dttm, ins_user) VALUES (#{banner_title}, #{banner_img}, #{banner_link}, #{banner_ord}, #{chk_at}, #{del_at}, now(), #{ins_user})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_banner SET banner_title = #{bannerTitle}, banner_img = #{bannerImg}, banner_link = #{bannerLink}, banner_ord = #{bannerOrd}, chk_at = #{chkAt}, del_at = #{delAt}, upt_dttm = now(), upt_user = #{uptUser} WHERE seq = #{seq}
